chapters.title: Chapter 43: Decisions and Apparitions
chapters.info: Machin Shin, p. 545—The Black Wind. It is a creature of the Ways, perhaps spawned from the taint, perhaps from something else. It wanders the Ways, consuming the souls of those it encounters. Those who make it out after being touched by Machin Shin are soulless, hollow shells—if they make it out at all.
